A

addBet(int) - Method in class core.game.Table
Adds a specified amount of chips to the pot.
addCommunityCard(Card) - Method in class core.game.Table
Adds a single card to the community cards on the table.
AIPlayer - Class in core.players
Extends Player to implement AI-driven decision making for poker gameplay based on hand strength, game state, and randomness.
AIPlayer(String, int, Game) - Constructor for class core.players.AIPlayer
Constructs an AI-controlled player with the specified name, initial chip count, and game context.
app - package app
The app package serves as the entry point for the Poker game application.
App - Class in app
Entry point for the Java Poker application.
App() - Constructor for class app.App
 

B

bet(int) - Method in class core.players.Player
Places a bet for the player, deducting the amount from their chips and adding it to the game's pot.

C

call() - Method in class core.players.Player
Matches the current highest bet in the game, if possible.
Card - Class in core.cards
Represents a standard playing card with a specific suit and rank.
Card(Card.Suit, Card.Rank) - Constructor for class core.cards.Card
Constructs a card with the specified suit and rank.
Card.Rank - Enum in core.cards
Enumeration of the thirteen ranks in a standard deck of cards, each with its display value.
Card.Suit - Enum in core.cards
Enumeration of the four suits in a standard deck of cards, each with a human-readable name and a symbol.
CardUtils - Class in util
Utility class providing methods to evaluate poker hands, compare players’ hands, and display hand combinations.
CardUtils() - Constructor for class util.CardUtils
 
check() - Method in class core.players.Player
Checks (passes) if the player does not wish to increase the bet.
CommandHandler - Class in ui
Processes console commands entered by the user and maps them to game actions.
CommandHandler(Game) - Constructor for class ui.CommandHandler
Creates a CommandHandler for the given game.
compareHands(Game) - Static method in class util.CardUtils
Compares all active (non-folded) players’ hands and returns the winning player.
ConsoleUI - Class in ui
Handles the visual display of the Poker game state on the console.
ConsoleUI() - Constructor for class ui.ConsoleUI
 
core.cards - package core.cards
The core.cards package provides the necessary classes for card-related operations in the poker game.
core.game - package core.game
The core.game package is responsible for managing the overall game state and mechanics of the Poker project.
core.players - package core.players
The core.players package defines the participants in the Poker game.

D

deal(Deck) - Method in class core.game.Table
Deals community cards from the provided deck according to poker rules: If no cards have been dealt yet, deals three cards (the flop). Otherwise, deals one card (turn or river) until five cards total.
dealCard() - Method in class core.cards.Deck
Deals (removes and returns) the top card from the deck.
dealHand(int, Player) - Method in class core.cards.Deck
Deals a hand of cards to the specified player.
Deck - Class in core.cards
Represents a deck of 52 standard playing cards.
Deck() - Constructor for class core.cards.Deck
Constructs a new deck and initializes it with all 52 cards.
displayWinner(Game, Player) - Method in class ui.ConsoleUI
Displays the winner of the game, the winning hand combination, and the final table state.

E

evaluateHand(ArrayList<Card>, ArrayList<Card>) - Static method in class util.CardUtils
Evaluates the combined strength of a player's hand and the community cards.

F

fold() - Method in class core.players.Player
Folds the player's hand, marking them as inactive for the remainder of the round.

G

Game - Class in core.game
Orchestrates the main poker game flow, including initializing players, handling rounds, dealing cards, updating players, and determining winners.
Game(int) - Constructor for class core.game.Game
Constructs a new Game instance and initializes it with the given number of AI opponents.
game - Variable in class core.players.Player
Reference to the game instance this player is part of.
GameConfig - Class in util
 
GameConfig() - Constructor for class util.GameConfig
 
get(String) - Static method in enum core.cards.Card.Rank
Retrieves a Rank by its display name.
get(String) - Static method in enum core.cards.Card.Suit
Retrieves a Suit by its human-readable name.
getBetAmount() - Method in class core.players.Player
Retrieves the total amount the player has bet in the current round.
getChips() - Method in class core.players.Player
Retrieves the number of chips the player currently has.
getCommand() - Method in class ui.InputHandler
Prompts the user for a command and reads a full line of input.
getCommunityCards() - Method in class core.game.Table
Returns the list of community cards currently on the table.
getDescription() - Method in class core.cards.Card
Returns a readable description of the card combining its symbol and rank.
getHand() - Method in class core.players.Player
Retrieves the player's current hand of cards.
getHighestBet() - Method in class core.game.Game
Retrieves the highest bet amount placed by any player in the current round.
getHighestRank(ArrayList<Card>, ArrayList<Card>) - Static method in class util.CardUtils
Finds the highest card rank present in the combined player and community hand.
getName() - Method in enum core.cards.Card.Rank
Returns the display name of the rank.
getName() - Method in enum core.cards.Card.Suit
Returns the human-readable name of the suit.
getName() - Method in class core.players.Player
Retrieves the player's display name.
getPlayers() - Method in class core.game.Game
Returns the list of players participating in the game.
getPotAmount() - Method in class core.game.Table
Retrieves the current total amount of chips in the pot.
getRank() - Method in class core.cards.Card
Returns the rank of this card.
getRankValue(Card.Rank) - Method in class core.cards.Card
Converts a Rank to its corresponding numeric value for comparison.
getSuit() - Method in class core.cards.Card
Returns the suit of this card.
getSymbol() - Method in enum core.cards.Card.Suit
Returns the symbol associated with the suit.
getTable() - Method in class core.game.Game
Returns the current table instance containing community cards and pot.

H

handleInput() - Method in class ui.CommandHandler
Reads a command from the console and executes the matching game action.

I

InputHandler - Class in ui
Handles console input for the Poker game by prompting the user and returning the entered command string.
InputHandler() - Constructor for class ui.InputHandler
Constructs a new InputHandler that reads from standard input.
isFolded() - Method in class core.players.Player
Indicates whether the player has folded in this round.
isGreaterThan(Card) - Method in class core.cards.Card
Compares this card to another based on their rank values.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class app.App
Main method to launch the Poker game.
makeDecision() - Method in class core.players.AIPlayer
Makes a betting decision based on the AI player's hand strength, the current highest bet, and a random factor to vary behavior.

P

Player - Class in core.players
Represents a participant in the poker game, managing their state, hand of cards, chip count, and betting actions.
Player(String, int, Game) - Constructor for class core.players.Player
Constructs a new player with a given name, initial chip count, and game context.
printCombination(ArrayList<Card>, ArrayList<Card>) - Static method in class util.CardUtils
Prints the type of poker hand combination (e.g., "Full House", "Straight").

R

renderGame(Game) - Method in class ui.ConsoleUI
Displays the current state of the game, including community cards, pot amount, and each player's name, chip count, and hand or fold status.
reset() - Method in class core.game.Table
Resets the table for a new round by clearing all community cards and resetting the pot to zero.
reset() - Method in class core.players.Player
Resets the player's state for a new game round.
run() - Method in class core.game.Game
Main game loop that continues running rounds until the game is stopped.

S

setChips(int) - Method in class core.players.Player
Updates the player's chip count directly.
shuffle() - Method in class core.cards.Deck
Randomly shuffles the cards in this deck.
sortCardsByDecreasingRank(ArrayList<Card>) - Static method in class util.CardUtils
 
stop() - Method in class core.game.Game
Stops the game, causing the run loop to exit.

T

Table - Class in core.game
Manages the game table by tracking community cards and the betting pot.
Table() - Constructor for class core.game.Table
Constructs a new Table with an empty community and a zeroed pot.

U

ui - package ui
The ui package handles all user interface operations within the Poker game.
util - package util
The util package provides supporting functionality for the Poker game.

V

values() - Static method in enum core.cards.Card.Suit
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

_

_gameEnded() - Method in class core.game.Game
Indicates whether the overall game has been stopped.
_init(int) - Method in class core.game.Game
Initializes game state, creates human and AI players, and prepares the first round.
